description: Extended rain can lead to flooding, soil instability, and delays in excavation or concrete work.
recommended_action: Install temporary drainage, use waterproof covers, adjust schedule around weather forecasts.

description: High temperatures can accelerate curing and compromise concrete quality.
recommended_action: Schedule pours during cooler hours, use cooling additives, and provide shade.

trigger_event: Lack of fall protection on elevated work areas
description: Working at heights without proper safety measures can result in injuries and OSHA violations.
recommended_action: Install guardrails, safety nets, and enforce use of personal fall arrest systems.

description: Unstable scaffolding can cause injuries or fatalities, triggering inspections or shutdowns.
recommended_action: Ensure scaffolding is erected and inspected by qualified personnel before use.

description: Permitting delays can halt the project start or specific phases such as structural work.
recommended_action: Begin permit application early, maintain documentation, follow up with authorities regularly.

description: Failing to schedule or pass inspections can stall progress and lead to rework.
recommended_action: Keep a shared inspection schedule, assign responsibility, confirm city availability early.

trigger_event: Lack of PPE enforcement on site
description: Inconsistent PPE use increases the chance of injury and liability exposure.
recommended_action: Conduct daily PPE checks, reinforce policy through toolbox talks, and assign safety monitors.

description: Delays in key material shipments (e.g.
likelihood: steel or rebar) can halt structural progress.
tags: Order materials early, maintain supplier communication, and identify local backup vendors.

description: Mechanical failure can cause work stoppages or hazards during vertical lifts.
recommended_action: Schedule regular crane inspections and pre-lift equipment checks.

description: Contaminated soil can require removal
recommended_action: Low
column9: Conduct soil testing during preconstruction, notify environmental authorities early.

description: Strong winds can prevent crane operations and create safety hazards on open structures.
recommended_action: Monitor wind forecasts and suspend crane use above safe thresholds.

description: Unshored or improperly sloped trenches can collapse and endanger workers.
recommended_action: Use trench boxes, follow OSHA trenching standards, and conduct daily inspections.

description: Shortage of qualified tradespeople can delay electrical
recommended_action: High
column9: Secure labor early, maintain subcontractor relationships, and consider incentives.

description: Accidental strikes of gas
impact_range_days: or electrical lines can halt work and trigger investigations.
recommended_action: Medium
column9: Call utility locate services before digging and review site utility maps.

trigger_event: Software outage in project management tools
description: Loss of scheduling or documentation software access can cause communication breakdowns.
recommended_action: Use cloud backups, offline access options, and notify team of protocols during outages.

description: Excessive noise can lead to restricted work hours or city-imposed penalties.
recommended_action: Use quieter machinery, limit noisy work to daytime hours, and notify nearby residents in advance.

trigger_event: Concrete not meeting strength test criteria
description: Failed strength tests may require partial demolition and rework of poured elements.
recommended_action: Ensure proper curing, test sample batches, and adjust mix design if needed.

description: This is a typical issue related to technology that may occur on a jobsite.
recommended_action: Ensure backups, maintain software access, and train users.

description: This is a typical issue related to weather that may occur on a jobsite.
recommended_action: Monitor forecasts, adjust schedules, and use weather protection measures.
